name: Slime Bath (redhue)
description:
How long can you last in a room that's filling with acidic slime? Is it sentient? What is it??

Controls

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Hold down Z: Build a wall
  • ESC: Back/Exit
  • Enter: Select (Menu)

While holding down Z it will "lock" the wall building direction while you move so you can build in a straight line.
